title: The Chemical Cocktail
description: Jaq Silver is back with a bang in this high-octane third novel in the seriesWhen Jaq Silverâ€™s mother dies, she is handed a poisoned chalice. An inheritance more valuable to her than she could have imagined. Travelling from Portugal to Brazil amid conspiracies and corruption to get to the bottom of her family mystery, Jaq learns she is not the only one with an interest in her unusual inheritance. Racing against the clock as the threats to her life increase on all sides, Jaq must use her scientific know-how to save what matters most.
author: Fiona Erskine
